name: Nuggie-Virus
description: Nuggie-Virus is a game made in one week in the Uncrowned Game Jam  the game theme was "far far away".  This is a rage game where you have to navigate through levels without touching your friends, the reason for this is you have the "Nuggie Virus" and need to remain social distancing by stay far far away! In this game there are two modes including "Survive" a rush for survival where you have to stay alive for as long as possible. And of course "levels" where you have to try to beat all 20 levels without touching your friends, Its a pretty hard game and i cant promise you'll win! If you enjoyed please leave feedback via a rating or comment, It really helps my games in the future become better :D
